in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.controller

Class AccessController

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.controller.BaseController
      • in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.controller.AccessController

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/")
public class AccessController
extends in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.controller.BaseController
    AccessController has four endpoints.
    • Login user
    • Logout user
    • Forgot password
    • Reset password
    Author:
    sairaghav

    • Method Detail

      • doLogin

        @RequestMapping(value="/kpinsights/user/login/",
                method=POST)
public in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.model.dto.DisplaySingleResult doLogin(@RequestParam(required=true,value="userCredentials")
                                                                             java.lang.String userCredentials)

        End-point to perform login service.

        Takes Base64 encoded combination of username & password then decodes and splits the string and provides them as parameters to authenticateUser method from AuthenticateService.

        Parameters:
        userCredentials - Base64 encoded form of username and password separated by +
        Returns:
        DisplaySingleResult which contains a Status object
        See Also:
        AuthenticationService

      • doLogout

        @RequestMapping(value="/kpinsights/user/logout/",
                method=POST)
public in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.model.dto.DisplaySingleResult doLogout(@RequestParam(required=true,value="authenticationToken")
                                                                              java.lang.String authenticationToken)

        End-point to perform logout service.

        Takes authentication token and provide it to deAuthenticateUser method from authenticationService which logs out user

        Parameters:
        autheticationToken - Token as generated when user logs in
        Returns:
        DisplaySingleResult which contains a Status object
        See Also:
        AuthenticationService

      • forgotPassword

        @RequestMapping(value="/kpinsights/user/forgotpw/",
                method=POST)
public in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.model.dto.DisplaySingleResult forgotPassword(@RequestParam(required=true,value="emailAddress")
                                                                                    java.lang.String emailAddress)

        End-point to perform forgot password service.

        Takes email address and an email containing authenticationToken is sent to user. Returns a status object in DisplaySingleResult.

        Parameters:
        emailAddress - emailAddress of the user whose password needs to be reset
        Returns:
        DisplaySingleResult which contains a Status object
        See Also:
        AccessService

      • resetPassword

        @RequestMapping(value="/kpinsights/user/resetpw/",
                method=POST)
public in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.model.dto.DisplaySingleResult resetPassword(@RequestParam(required=true,value="emailAddress")
                                                                                   java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                                                                   @RequestParam(required=true,value="passwordResetAuthenticationToken")
                                                                                   java.lang.String passwordResetAuthenticationToken,
                                                                                   @RequestParam(required=true,value="newPassword")
                                                                                   java.lang.String newPassword)

        End-point to perform password reset service.

        Takes email address, encoded password and authenticationToken and resets user's password.

        Parameters:
        emailAddress - emailAddress of the user
        passwordResetAuthenticationToken - Token as received by user in email
        newPassword - Base64 encoded newPassword
        Returns:
        DisplaySingleResult which contains a Status object
